about page.en:
Welcome to TypeTalk! 
We're an anonymous chatbot that connects you with like-minded people based on your MBTI personality type.

Instructions: 
Type /join to start a new chat
Use /settings to customize your search parameters. 
Use /stop to end a chat anytime. 
Use /next to switch chat partners during a conversation. 

We prioritize your privacy and ensure that all chats are anonymous and kept confidential!!
